item.title: Edge Authentication
item.description: What is Edge Authentication Service? It is a java based container service that provides Edge Authentication capabilities to any Microservice Architecure using Single Factor Authentication. It can generate time bound JWT tokens and also provide the JWKS KeySet over the URI for validation. The service is completely written in Java using Springboot. If you think you are the Java and FOSS enthusiast, feel free to fork and add features. Get started!
